name: mupihat
description: MuPiHAT Battery Management Plugin for Volumio - Enables battery monitoring and management for the MuPiHAT Raspberry Pi HAT.
author: MuPiHAT Team

volumio_info.details: MuPiHAT plugin provides battery monitoring and management functionality for the MuPiHAT Raspberry Pi HAT. Features include real-time battery status monitoring, web-based monitoring interface, I2C-based communication with BQ25792 charger IC, configurable logging, and systemd service management. The plugin integrates seamlessly with Volumio to provide battery information and control for portable audio systems.
volumio_info.changelog: Initial release with full MuPiHAT integration including battery monitoring service, web interface support, I2C configuration, and systemd service management.
